alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:40PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 1230 AM EDT... At 1139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mastic Beach, or near Center Moriches, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manorville, Wading River, Center Moriches, Mastic, Mastic Beach, Calverton, Brookhaven National Laboratory, East Moriches and Remsenburg-Speonk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
